Package com.intellij.openapi.options

Class ConfigurableProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.openapi.options.ConfigurableProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebuggerConfigurableProvider, EmmetConfigurableProvider, ErrorsConfigurableProvider, ExternalDependenciesConfigurableProvider, FileEncodingConfigurableProvider, IntentionsConfigurableProvider, NotificationsConfigurableProvider, PyDependenciesConfigurableProvider, PythonContentEntriesConfigurableProvider, RemoteServerListConfigurableProvider, TextMateConfigurableProvider, VcsManagerConfigurableProvider

    public abstract class ConfigurableProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Register implementation of this class as projectConfigurable or applicationConfigurable extension to provide items for "Project Settings" and "IDE Settings" groups correspondingly in the "Settings" dialog
    See Also:

      • createConfigurable

        public abstract Configurable createConfigurable()

      • canCreateConfigurable

        public boolean canCreateConfigurable()
        Defines whether this provider creates a configurable or not. Note that the createConfigurable method will be called if this method returns true.
        Returns:
        true if this provider creates configurable, false otherwise
